00021   Contextualize_Eval* Contextualize_Eval::with(Selector* s, Env* e, Backtrace* bt, Selector* p, Selector* ex)
00022   {
00023     Contextualize::with(s, e, bt, p, ex);
00024     eval = eval->with(s, e, bt, p, ex);
00025     return this;
00026   }
00027 
00028   Selector* Contextualize_Eval::operator()(Selector_Schema* s)
00029   {
00030     To_String to_string;
00031     string result_str(s->contents()->perform(eval)->perform(&to_string));
00032     result_str += '{'; // the parser looks for a brace to end the selector
00033     Selector* result_sel = Parser::from_c_str(result_str.c_str(), ctx, s->pstate()).parse_selector_group();
00034     return result_sel->perform(this);
00035   }

00062   Selector* Contextualize_Eval::operator()(Attribute_Selector* s)
00063   {
00064     // the value might be interpolated; evaluate it
00065     String* v = s->value();
00066     if (v && eval) {
00067      Eval* eval_with = eval->with(parent, env, backtrace);
00068      v = static_cast<String*>(v->perform(eval_with));
00069     }
00070     To_String toString;
00071     Attribute_Selector* ss = new (ctx.mem) Attribute_Selector(*s);
00072     ss->value(v);
00073     return ss;
00074   }
00075
